comment: Amber Heard is a fraud and liar.
commentable_entity.ask: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!
commentable_entity.title: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!
commentable_entity.description: Amber Heard testified that $7M was DONATED to two different charities, ACLU, and the Childrens hospital. She did so on the stand, in the tabloids, and in interviews as well. A portion of the money was given directly to the charities by Johnny’s accountant. She ordered that the rest be given directly to her. She stated the if Mr. Depp wanted to donate the 7M directly, that he would have to donate 14M to be able to claim it as a tax deduction due to his tax bracket. Later we found out Ms. Heard had the $7M for 13 months before Mr. Depp’sp lawsuit and never donated a dime of it. She committed purgery on the stand! The IRS should audit her tax records to ensure that she did not claim the $7M that she PLEDGED but NEVER  DONATED as a tax deduction to the charities.
commentable_entity.letter_body: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!
commentable_entity.display_title: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!
commentable_entity.petition_title: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!

commentable_entity.description: Amber Heard testified that $7M was DONATED to two different charities, ACLU, and the Childrens hospital. She did so on the stand, in the tabloids, and in interviews as well. A portion of the money was given directly to the charities by Johnny’s accountant. She ordered that the rest be given directly to her. She stated the if Mr. Depp wanted to donate the 7M directly, that he would have to donate 14M to be able to claim it as a tax deduction due to his tax bracket. Later we found out Ms. Heard had the $7M for 13 months before Mr. Depp’sp lawsuit and never donated a dime of it. She committed purgery on the stand! The IRS should audit her tax records to ensure that she did not claim the $7M that she PLEDGED but NEVER  DONATED as a tax deduction to the charities.
commentable_entity.letter_body: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!
commentable_entity.display_title: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!
commentable_entity.petition_title: IRS Check Amber Heards Tax document for “donation” write off!!
